verses.roman:
mohayitvā tu giriśaṁ
jṛmbhaṇāstreṇa jṛmbhitam
bāṇasya pṛtanāṁ śaurir
jaghānāsi-gadeṣubhiḥ

synonyms: mohayitvā—bewildering; tu—then; giriśam—Lord Śiva; jṛmbhaṇa-astreṇa—with a yawning weapon; jṛmbhitam—made to yawn; bāṇasya—of Bāṇa; pṛtanām—the army; śauriḥ—Lord Kṛṣṇa; jaghāna—struck; asi—with His sword; gadā—club; iṣubhiḥ—and arrows.
translation: After bewildering Lord Śiva by making him yawn with a yawning weapon, Lord Kṛṣṇa proceeded to strike down Bāṇāsura's army with His sword, club and arrows.
